item.title: What is Data Engineering?
item.description: What is Data Engineering? Data Engineering is a relatively new field in data-related topics. When we are talking about data folks, we usually think about two types of responsibilities inside the team: those who analyze the data those who prepare the data for analysis In the first category there are Data Analysts, Data Scientist, Data Visualization specialists, Product Analysts, etc. In the second category there are more technical people: Data Engineers, BI developers, DevOps/DataOps.
